title: North to Wales
creator_credit: Michael Clarke, Ian Ferguson and British Transport Films
brief_description: This is a historical journey of Wales, a reminiscent perspective of the narrator’s life in Wales from a young lad to his return. We travel across Wales focusing on this beautiful and picturesque countryside full of wild country views to the ruined castles that protect its mountains.
